title: Vintage Rosaline Quartz and Polki Diamond Stud Earrings
features: Classic floral design featuring a central cabochon Rosaline Quartz surrounded by a halo of Polki diamonds in a closed setting. The setting is handcrafted using traditional 'Kundun' techniques. Polki diamond setting adds a rustic, heritage charm. The rose quartz cabochon gives a classic vintage look.
occasions: Suitable for traditional occasions like weddings (Vivaha)
and half-saree functions (Pavada Dhavani). Also perfect for adding a touch of heritage elegance to contemporary outfits.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship passed down through generations. Rosaline Quartz radiates sophistication and love. Polki diamonds provide a unique, raw beauty that contrasts beautifully with the gold. This is a timeless piece of heirloom jewelry that can be cherished for years to come. The earrings are a unique fusion of traditional design and modern wearability.
